articles.title: Kalanithi Maran, KAL Airways To Seek Rs 1,323 Crore In Damages From SpiceJet, Its Chief - NDTV
articles.description: KAL Airways and Kalanithi Maran on Monday said they will seek more than Rs 1,323 crore in damages from SpiceJet and its chief Ajay Singh as well as challenge the recent Delhi High Court order in the ongoing dispute between the two sides.

articles.title: mutual fund news: These 3 equity mutual fund categories deliver over 25% return in three years - Chart Toppers - The Economic Times
articles.description: Around three equity mutual fund categories have offered more than 25% return in the last three years, according to data by ACE MF. These schemes gave returns ranging between 26 to 44% in the said period. Chart Toppers
